title: Omega Squad Skin Line?
body: With Teemo getting a new legendary skin titled 'Omega Squad Teemo' wou;dnt it see great if a bunch of other yordles turned bad ass and get and omega squad skin? for e.g Omega Squad Gnar, Omega Squad Corki, Omega Squad poppy etc... the skin was a great idea cause it turned Teemos into a badass so why dont we turn some other yordles into badass's?

replies.body: HMM not bad in fact they also need santa claus {{champion:432}} cos he is obese
